text: Pen mam ay sɨkop, yad anɨb agebin, ñɨn ak wulep mɨdeb. Anɨb ak mɨñɨl tɨkjakɨl mɨd dad amɨl, bɨ bin dɨpal okok kɨli bin ma dɨpal tek yenɨgel.7.29 Chɨn bɨ bin dɨpun okok, bin kɨlop nep gos ma nɨgɨnɨgun. Bɨawl wog nop, tap ne okok abe gos nɨgɨnɨgun. Pol ne gos anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, takaw anɨb awl agup.
